Text:
I played this game a long time ago. I once had it build with offices, shopping center, movie theatres, elevators everywhere.

If you get a five star establishment, you can put in a chapel.

Yeah, it sounded more awesome ten years ago...
I prefer to wait for Sid Meiers Railroads...

Very Nice, I never thought to make a torrent of it though.
